title: Lando Norris vs Oscar Piastri: it’s crunch time in F1 title race
summary: Oscar Piastri or Lando Norris? Unless Max Verstappen pulls off an Alain Prost 1986-style miracle, this year’s world championship battle will answer that question. The Australian seized the initiative in…

qa_pairs.question: Which team do Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri drive for in Formula 1?
Who is the current reigning champion in Formula 1 as of 2023?
What significant event happened in the 1986 F1 season involving Alain Prost?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Prost lost the championship in the final race to Nelson Piquet.
wrong_options: Prost won the championship before the last race.
Prost switched teams during the season.
